___citation.description: The citation specifies the written source where the biological knowledge was referenced.
___citation.title: Citation

___name.description: The citation name of the reference.
___name.title: Citation Name

___type.description: The citation type of the reference.
___type.title: Citation Type

___authors.description: The citation authors of the reference.
___authors.title: Citation Authors

___comment.description: The citation comment of the reference.
___comment.title: Citation Comment

___date.description: The citation date of the reference.
___date.title: Citation Date

___id.description: The citation identifier (PubMed ID, ISBN, DOI, URL) of the reference.
___id.title: Citation ID

___references.description: The references section identifies annotation and namespace URIs.
___references.title: References

___keyword.description: Keyword that identifies this annotation resource, but only in the context of this Nanopub.
___keyword.title: Keyword

___uri.description: URI that identifies this annotation resource.
___uri.title: URI

___keyword.description: Keyword that identifies this namespace resource, but only in the context of this Nanopub.
___keyword.title: Keyword

___uri.description: URI that identifies this namespace resource.
___uri.title: URI

___bel_statement.description: A BEL Statement is an expression that represents knowledge of the existence of biological entities and relationships between them that are known to be observed within a particular context, based on some source of prior knowledge such as a scientific publication or newly generated experimental data.
___bel_statement.title: BEL Statement

___support.description: Abstract from source text to provide support for this nanopub
___support.title: Support

___experiment_context.description: An experiment context specifies the experiment's parameters where this interaction was observed.
___experiment_context.title: Experiment Context

___name.description: Annotation type listing - sourced from the BEL Annotation resource names
___name.title: Annotation Type

___value.description: Annotations such as Homo sapiens, cancer, epithelial tissue sourced from the BEL Annotation resources
___value.title: Annotations

___metadata.description: Metadata that describes the nanopub resource.
___metadata.title: Nanopub resource metadata

___name.description: The name of this metadata property.
